name: Marty McFlea Back to the Present (WIP)
name_original: Marty McFlea Back to the Present (WIP)
description:
Note:

This is a  (WIP)  that I hope to finish and release soon.  It is playable enough to post it on here and hopefully get some feedback.  Thank you for clicking.

Prologue:

Get ready for retro action platformer.   Marty has been lost in an unknown location and time.  Help Marty use  weapons and skill to conquer  action filled levels to finally get back  to his happy home on Thomas  the Cat.

Keyboard Controls:

Keyboard:

Move=" Arrow Keys " Jump= "c"  Shoot= "x"  Start/Pause="return"

Xbox 360 controls

JoyPad:360 Controller

Move = Left Stick or Digital Pad Jump="A" Shoot="X" Pause="Start"
